Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 71st/Dorchester
ShortDescription: Eastbound 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Dorchester, 73rd, Stony Island, and 71st due to, street blockage near 71st/Dorchester.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Dorchester, 73rd, Stony Island, and 71st due to, street blockage near 71st/Dorchester.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
